title: About
company_body:
At ValorForge, our strength lies in our people—veterans and experts with grit, experience, and a track record of delivering wins in combat and corporate America. We're partners in your success and America's future, helping federal agencies dominate with agile, cost effective solutions that generate real alpha.

Our founder, a service-disabled veteran and Texas A&M mechanical engineering graduate with extensive experience in leading multimillion-dollar IT initiatives, guides teams in scaling platforms like Palantir Foundry/AIP, ServiceNow, Palo Alto, Databricks, AWS/Azure—including quantum-resistant AI and edge computing for lasting impact. Investor networks fuel collaboration, per the AI Action Plan's SBIR/STTR. Bootstrapped with resilience, our team's expertise enhances margins 20%, speeds delivery 30%, ensures compliance. We target 70% rural veteran hires by Year 3, aligning with DOL/NSF training—creating jobs, skills, and national vitality.

What makes us unique is that we draw insights not only from analytics and AI, but walking in the front lines with your experts incorporating their voice, pain points and ideas in creating tactical solutions that deliver immediate wins with long-term strategic and sustainable improvements/gains.

cards.title: Mission
cards.body: Deliver secure AI solutions for government missions, veteran-led and Plan-aligned. Optimize efficiency, security; reinvest 20% profits in veterans, families, faith-based causes —creating value for clients and advancing U.S. excellence.

cards.title: Vision Statement
cards.body: Strive for excellence in everything we do and become America's premier SDVOSB, driven by veteran grit, rural talent, investor insights. Forge American excellence through Plan's innovation, workforce, secure AI—delivering alpha for agencies and nation. "Laus Deo"
